verses.roman:
pūrva-pakṣa kahe--tomāra bhāla ta' vyākhyāna
paravyoma-nārāyaṇa svayaṁ-bhagavān

synonyms: pūrva-pakṣa—opposing side; kahe—says; tomāra—your; bhāla—nice; ta'-certainly; vyākhyāna—exposition; para-vyoma—situated in the spiritual sky; nārāyaṇa—Lord Nārāyaṇa; svayam—Himself; bhagavān—the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
translation: An opponent may say, "This is your interpretation, but actually the Supreme Lord is Nārāyaṇa, who is in the transcendental realm.
